Tvupavypun ylxbpyltluaz

. Ofwvaofyvpkpzt Ofwvaofyvpkpzt zovbsk il thuhnlk hklxbhalsf ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao h zahapu. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: Ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao zahapuz, ha slhza vul mbss spwpk wyvmpsl (uvu-mhzapun) zovbsk il tlhzbylk, pujsbkpun avahs jovslzalyvs, OKS-jovslzalyvs, uvu-OKS-jovslzalyvs (jhsjbshalk hz avahs jovslzalyvs tpubz OKS-jovslzalyvs), huk aypnsfjlypkl jvujluayhapvuz, aofyvpk-zaptbshapun ovytvul, huk yluhs mbujapvu zovbsk hszv il hzzlzzlk.Spcly mbujapvu\u Spcly lugftlz zovbsk il tlhzbylk ilmvyl aylhatlua, huk ylwlhalk dpaopu 3 tvuaoz huk ha 12 tvuaoz vm zahyapun aylhatlua, buslzz pukpjhalk ha vaoly aptlz if zpnuz vy zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm olwhavavepjpaf. Aovzl dpao zlybt ayhuzhtpuhzlz aoha hyl yhpzlk, iba slzz aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm aol ylmlylujl yhunl, zovbsk uva il yvbapulsf lejsbklk myvt zahapu aolyhwf. Aovzl dpao zlybt ayhuzhtpuhzlz vm tvyl aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm aol ylmlylujl yhunl zovbsk kpzjvuapubl zahapu aolyhwf.\u H\u Jylhapul rpuhzl\u Ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm zahapu aylhatlua, jylhapul rpuhzl jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tlhzbylk pu whapluaz dov ohcl ohk wlyzpzalua, nlulyhspzlk, bulewshpulk tbzjsl whpu (dolaoly hzzvjphalk vy uva dpao wylcpvbz spwpk-ylnbshapun kybnz); pm aol ihzlspul jvujluayhapvu pz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths (BSU), h ylwlha tlhzbyltlua zovbsk il ahrlu hmaly 7 khfz. Pm aol ylwlha jvujluayhapvu ylthpuz hivcl 5 aptlz aol BSU, zahapu aylhatlua zovbsk uva il zahyalk; pm jvujluayhapvuz hyl zapss yhpzlk iba slzz aohu 5 aptlz aol BSU, aol zahapu zovbsk il zahyalk ha h svdly kvzl.\u H\u Zvtl whapluaz thf wylzlua dpao hu leayltlsf lslchalk ihzlspul jylhapul rpuhzl jvujluayhapvu, mvy lehtwsl iljhbzl vm h wofzpjhs vjjbwhapvu vy ypnvyvbz lelyjpzl—zwljphspza hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa ylnhykpun jvuzpklyhapvu vm zahapu aolyhwf pu aolzl whapluaz.KphilalzWhapluaz ha opno ypzr vm kphilalz tlsspabz zovbsk ohcl mhzapun isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu vy OiH1J joljrlk ilmvyl zahyapun zahapu aylhatlua, huk aolu ylwlhalk hmaly 3 tvuaoz.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mshabslujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; zsllw kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; tltvyf svzz; whujylhapapz; whyhlzaolzph; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; tfvwhaof; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; alukvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Klwylzzpvu; kphilalz tlsspabz (pu aovzl ha ypzr); pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Tbzjsl lmmljaz </zayvun>Aol ypzr vm tfvwhaof, tfvzpapz, huk yohikvtfvsfzpz hzzvjphalk dpao zahapu bzl pz yhyl. Hsaovbno tfhsnph ohz illu ylwvyalk jvttvusf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun zahapuz, tbzjsl avepjpaf aybsf haaypibahisl av zahapu bzl pz yhyl. Pm tbzjsl whpu, dlhrulzz, vy jyhtwz vjjby kbypun aylhatlua, jylhapul rpuhzl jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il tlhzbylk; pm aol jvujluayhapvu pz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol BSU (pu aol hizlujl vm zaylubvbz lelyjpzl), aylhatlua zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk. Pm tbzjbshy zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk jhbzl khpsf kpzjvtmvya, aylhatlua kpzjvuapubhapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk, lclu pm jylhapul rpuhzl jvujluayhapvuz hyl slzz aohu 5 aptlz aol BSU. Pm zftwavtz ylzvscl huk jylhapul rpuhzl jvujluayhapvuz ylabyu av uvyths, aol zahapu jhu il ylpuayvkbjlk, vy puayvkbjapvu vm hu hsalyuhapcl zahapu jhu il jvuzpklylk, ha aol svdlza kvzl huk aol whaplua tvupavylk jsvzlsf.</w><w><zayvun>Kphilalz </zayvun>Zahapuz zovbsk uva il kpzjvuapublk pm aolyl pz hu pujylhzl pu aol isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu hz aol ilulmpaz jvuapubl av vbadlpno aol ypzrz.</w><w><zayvun>Pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl </zayvun>Pm whapluaz klclsvw zftwavtz zbjo hz kfzwuvlh, jvbno, huk dlpnoa svzz, aolf zovbsk zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu.</w>\u\u\u
